archimate:Contract.name: [Policy] Consistent with Operational Science Configuration specified by LSST Data Release Board (Contract)
archimate:Contract.documentation: Update templates consistent with the operations of L1, normally implying daily operations. A concern is that the templates are expected to be very large, and may not be able to be updated in one night. Update reference photometric and astromentric catalogs according to LSST data release board, providing for contingency of rolling back to previous versions of catalogs.
